Name: Move Blocks
Explanation: Using the up or down arrows moves between the blocks in the editor and the tray. Pressing the tab key goes from the block to any fields within the block.

Name: Run Program
Explanation: Attempts to start a program and throws an error if it cannot

Name: Hide Tray
Explanation: Hides the tray if it is shown and shows it if not

Name: Zoom In
Explanation: Zooms in on the editor and the tray

Name: Zoom Out
Explanation: Zooms out of the editor and the tray

Name: Open Help
Explanation: Opens the help dialog and can be closed with the escape key

Name: Navigate to Tray
Explanation: Jumps the focus to the tray

Name: Navigate to Blocks
Explanation: Jumps the focus to the editor

Name: Enter Navigation Mode
Explanation: Allows the system to move to hidden nodes for alternative keyboard controls with the arrow keys
